description:
A simple Android app to help you practice and memorize basic Japanese kanji.

MyKanji is an interactive, pastel-themed Android app to help you practice and memorize basic Japanese kanji using multiple-choice questions, sound effects, and cat animations.

ðŸŽ® Features

  • Random kanji quiz with English translations
  • 4-choice questions with one correct answer
  • Correct and incorrect feedback dialogs
  • Tracks your current streak and kanji seen
  • Sound effects and animated cats for motivation
